workflow_runs.name: Glean probe-scraper
workflow_runs.display_title: VPN-3055 - Duplicate all data collection using vpnglean (#5148)

head_commit.message:
VPN-3055 - Duplicate all data collection using vpnglean (#5148)

* Pass event extras and extras parser as pointers

Since both extras and extras parser will be classes derived from base
classes, they need to be passed around as pointers otherwise the
overrides are not accessible to funtion that expect the base class as an
argument.

* Duplicate data collection on C++

* Duplicate ping submission too

* BUGFIX: Properly include vpnglean dependency on testing atrgets

* Make Glean Rust default on

I was going to add this to a separate PR, but it makes testing easier
and it is such a tiny change (even though it's super impactiful)...

* Implement a test for addon_state_changed event

    So this serves as a test example for the system.
    Ideally we will have all telemetry colleciton tested, that will be done
    as a separate task.

* BUGFIX: Fix issues with loading Glea ncustom types in QML

* Duplicate data collection on QML

* Add some more required windows system libraries

* Extend lifetime of extras arrays passed thorugh the FFI

Extend websocket metrics expiration dates (#5267)

Co-authored-by: Sarah Bird <sbird@mozilla.com>

head_commit.message:
VPN-3508 - part 5 - feature list and settings are shared (#5257)

*Settings changes*
- shared and per-app settings
- SettingsHolder application name from appconstants.h
- cryptosettings as shared component
- macos/ios crypto settings strings from appsconstants.h

*Feature flags*
- shared and per-app feature flags
- apps/vpn/models/feature -> shared/feature

*App template*
- apps/template - the min set of files to create a new app

*Platform specific code in shared*
- WindowsUtils for the windowsVersion

*Other changes*
- Env as shared object
- VPNSettings.placeholderUserDNS -> VPN.placeholderUserDNS
- VersionApi.compareVersion -> VersionUtils.compareVersion (to be shareable)

VPN-3512 - [PROPOSAL] Require C++ 20 for builds (#5193)

* Require C++ 20 for builds

* Tentative README.md update

* Apply Owen's suggestion

* Remove WinRT import and code that uses it

The version of cppwinrt that we use is v2.0.200609.3
and it comes from Windows SDK 10.0.19041.0.

That version of cppwinrt has a bug for suppoting C++20,
which is fixed on version 2.0.200921.6.

It's unclear wheather it is safe for us to update to a Windows SDK
version that includes the correct version of cppwinrt, because that
would require us to be on a Windows 11 SDK. We are unsure whether
building with that will result in binaries that can also be run on
Windows 10.

After speaking to Basti, we decided the least problematic way to address
this is to simply remove the code that relies on cppwinrt. That will be
removed anyways as soon as we more to Qt6.3 or above, because Qt will
provide the APIs we are currently getting from cppwinrt.

That code is only being called to add an extra key to a Glean event
recording, so this doesn't actually affect user facing features on the
app.'

* qmake: Force python3 path for glean at config time
* Update README with instructions for simulation
* Fix missing vpnglean generated directory error

workflow_runs.name: Glean probe-scraper
workflow_runs.display_title: VPN-3071(Part 2) Implement in-app auth and desktop purchase (#4901)

head_commit.message:
VPN-3071(Part 2) Implement in-app auth and desktop purchase (#4901)

* Remove inAppPurchase feature as it's used by all now.
* Add new screen for PurchaseWeb
* Add email address for FxA screen
This ensures that the user is presented with a login screen that is
pre-populated with the email address that they have just entered and
authed with.
* chore: Ajustments to the ScreenSubscriptionNeededWeb layout (#4923) 
Co-authored-by: Florian Zia <fzia@mozilla.com>
* Do not schedule TaskAccount during subscriptionFailedInternal
This prevents us getting into a state where our settingsHolder gets
destroyed when the TaskAccount completes and accountChecked runs.
This also seems to fix VPN-3217.
* Update translations/strings.yaml
Co-authored-by: Francesco Lodolo <flod@lodolo.net>
* Fix functional tests

Co-authored-by: Florian Zia <fzia@mozilla.com>
Co-authored-by: Francesco Lodolo <flod@lodolo.net>

workflow_runs.name: Glean probe-scraper
workflow_runs.display_title: Measure and display latency in server view. (#4234)

head_commit.message:
Measure and display latency in server view. (#4234)

* Initial latency measurement task.
* Replace server-unavailable with latency score indicator
* Bump periodic task interval to 30s on staging
* Drive server latency data from Server model changes.
* Explicitly bind to INADDR_ANY when ping sender has a null address.
* Use IcmpSendEcho2 when sending pings without an explicit source.
* Add feature to enable/disable server latency
* Return a list of ServerCity objects from the CitiesRole
* Adjust connection score to prefer locations with more servers.
* Implement retries when measuring server latency

* Initial experiments building for iOS with CMake
* Add Info.plist template
* Build network extension for iOS
* Add Adjust support with -DBUILD_ADJUST_SDK_TOKEN=<token>
* Add some notes to the README.md
* Remove duplicate wireguard-go-version.h

* Use find_program to locate golang build tool.
* Fix ios app entitlements
* XCode: disable auto-generation of build schemes for every target

* Add workaround for iOS simulator builds on M1/M2 macbooks.
* Fix bug in macos app entitlements
* Split gleansample.h generation to fix Xcode dependency bug.
* Update ci_post_clone.sh for Xcode cloud
* Fix dependency loop between vpnglean and mozillavpn targets
* README: Correct capitalization of Xcode
* Fix vpnglean builds for iOS on M1 macs
* vpnglean: Force linking with /usr/bin/cc when building in Xcode
* qmake: Force python3 path for glean at config time
* Update README with instructions for simulation
* Fix missing vpnglean generated directory error
